title: Admin Orders panel cart-style UI refresh

requirements.summary: Restyle the Admin Orders list into cart-style rounded order cards with warm total accents and pill controls.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Orders list no longer looks like a plain data table on small screens; it uses card-style rows with rounded corners, border, and soft shadow similar to the cart reference.

Each order row prominently shows: Order #, customer name, item count, total amount (in primary/warm accent), status badge, and a single primary action (e.g., View Details) styled with rounded/pill design.
Spacing, typography hierarchy, and component radii/shadows are consistent with the cart-style sheet aesthetic (rounded-2xl/3xl feel, soft shadows, light borders).
All admin-facing labels remain in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the current orders Table-based rendering with a responsive, cart-style card list (rounded-2xl/3xl, soft shadows, light borders) and a warm primary accent for totals; wire in the new order-card component and keep the existing admin permissions/filters. Use shadcn-ui components (Card, Badge, Button, ScrollArea, Input, Select, Dialog) to preserve consistent behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated AdminOrderCard presentational component to render a single order as a cart-style card: prominent Order # and customer name, item count, status badge, total (text-primary), and a single pill/rounded primary action button. Use shadcn-ui components (Card/Badge/Button) for consistent styling and interaction. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add admin order list utility/component classes (e.g., admin-order-card, admin-order-card-meta, admin-order-total, admin-pill-action) using Tailwind @apply to standardize rounded corners, border/shadow softness, spacing, and readable dark-mode borders/shadows without touching frontend/src/components/ui. Ensure warm primary accent remains readable in both modes.

requirements.summary: Restyle the Admin Order Details dialog with cart-item cards and a warm-accent summary block, keeping pill status controls.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Order Details dialog, the 'Order Items' section renders items as individual rounded cards (not plain divider rows), with clear quantity emphasis (e.g., “2×” styling) and item name/variant/price readability similar to the cart reference.
The dialog includes a visually distinct summary area (card or separated block) that prominently displays the order total using the warm primary color treatment.
Status update controls in the dialog use rounded/pill button styling consistent with the cart-style controls.

file_operations.description: Update the Order Details dialog layout: render the Order Items section as a cart-style list of item cards and add a distinct summary block at the bottom that highlights the total amount with warm primary styling; ensure status update buttons are consistently pill/rounded and match the cart-style control look. Use shadcn-ui components (Dialog, Card, Button, Badge, Separator, ScrollArea) and existing currency formatting. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create an AdminOrderItemsList component that renders order items as individual cart-item style cards (rounded-2xl, border, shadow-sm) with emphasized quantity (e.g., “2×”), clear name/price layout, and per-item total; designed for reuse inside the Admin Order Details dialog. Use shadcn-ui components (Card/Separator as needed) to match the app’s design system. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add styling helpers for the admin order details items and summary (e.g., admin-order-item-card, admin-order-item-qty, admin-order-summary) to achieve the cart-style look and ensure consistent dark-mode contrast for borders/shadows and primary accent totals, without modifying frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Add Tailwind-based local styling support for cart-style admin order cards and summary blocks across light/dark modes without editing immutable UI component sources.
acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to files under frontend/src/components/ui (composed only).
The updated Admin Orders styling looks correct in both light and dark mode (borders, shadows, and primary accent remain readable).
No regression to existing customer-facing cart/checkout components.

file_operations.description: Consolidate any repeated Tailwind class patterns into admin-specific @layer utilities/components classes for the new cart-style order cards, pill controls, and summary blocks; ensure dark-mode border/shadow/foreground contrast remains readable while leaving customer-facing cart/checkout styling unchanged.

If needed to match the cart-style aesthetic more closely, adjust/extend Tailwind theme tokens already in use (e.g., add an additional softer shadow or radius token) while keeping existing tokens stable to avoid regressions in customer-facing cart/checkout UI.
